html:
mourneth. See note on Isaiah 3:26.

mourneth and fadeth away. languish. Hebrew. umlelah nablah tebel umlalu .

the earth, &c. Figure of speechProsopopoeia . This is one of the three places where (in the Hebrew) one verse ends with"the earth" and the next verse begins with "the earth", being the Figure of speechAnadiplosis . The other two passages are Genesis 1:1, Genesis 1:2 , and Hosea 2:23, Hosea 2:24.
